home.subtitle: Taste & Love
home.title: We invite you to our restaurant for unique flavors and unforgettable experiences.
home.desc: Since 2010, we’ve been offering unforgettable culinary experiences to our guests with our unique recipes made from fresh and local ingredients. Our chefs blend the finest examples of world cuisine with Turkish flavors to create one-of-a-kind tastes.

footer.desc: Guba Garden is a hidden gem in 2nd Nugadi village, Guba — a place where the charm of tradition, the taste of local flavors, and the comfort of modern design come together to create an unforgettable dining experience.
